PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-05722010-05-13NRCAN,  ,  ,  , 
ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Nuclear Non-proliferation Import and Export Control Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the NUCLEAR NON-PROLIFERATION IMPORT AND EXPORT CONTROL REGULATIONS to a) reflect revisions to the Nuclear Suppliers Group (NSG) Guidelines on nuclear and dual-use transfers since 2000; b) reduce regulatory burden for items of very low proliferation risk while continuing to ensure effective and efficient regulatory oversight.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0106 Publication Date: 2010-05-26
AttachmentsAttachment
